description: Short alphabetic code representing each continent (e.g., 'EU', 'AS', 'AF').
Official full name of the country (e.g., 'France', 'Japan', 'Brazil').
ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code (e.g., 'FR' for France, 'JP' for Japan).
ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 country code (e.g., 'FRA' for France, 'JPN' for Japan).
ISO 3166-1 numeric country code (e.g., '250' for France, '392' for Japan).
